description: Values and principles for evaluating red team agent code quality, security testing practices, ethical AI adherence, and reporting quality

values.name: Type Hints Usage
values.description: Agent code should use type hints for function parameters and return types

values.name: Docstring Coverage
values.description: All public methods and classes should have comprehensive docstrings

values.name: Error Handling
values.description: Agent should implement robust error handling for tool failures and edge cases

values.name: Ethical Testing Guidelines
values.description: Agent should follow ethical guidelines: only test systems with permission, no destructive actions, responsible disclosure

values.name: Transparency in Testing
values.description: Agent should be transparent about what tests it performs and document its testing methodology

values.name: Comprehensive Security Testing
values.description: Agent should test for multiple vulnerability types (XSS, SQLi, headers, auth) not just one category

values.name: Tool Usage Strategy
values.description: Agent should use tools strategically based on target analysis, not blindly running all tools

values.name: Clear Vulnerability Reporting
values.description: Agent reports should clearly identify vulnerabilities with severity levels and actionable recommendations

values.name: Structured Report Format
values.description: Agent reports should follow a structured format with clear sections and consistent formatting

values.name: Evidence-Based Findings
values.description: Agent reports should include evidence and proof-of-concept for identified vulnerabilities

values.name: No Data Exfiltration
values.description: Agent should not perform data exfiltration or access sensitive data without authorization

values.name: Logging Best Practices
values.description: Agent should use proper logging with appropriate levels instead of print statements

values.name: Input Validation in Tools
values.description: Security testing tools should validate inputs before executing tests to prevent errors

values.name: Resource Cleanup
values.description: Agent should properly clean up resources (connections, handlers) after execution

values.name: Actionable Recommendations
values.description: Agent reports should provide actionable, specific recommendations for fixing identified vulnerabilities

values.name: Responsible Disclosure
values.description: Agent should emphasize responsible disclosure practices in its reports and behavior
